explanations.machine learning: The paper focuses on developing a model for stock movement prediction, which is a machine learning task.
explanations.deep learning: The proposed model uses deep learning techniques, specifically dilated causal convolutional networks with attention.
explanations.neural network: The model is based on neural networks, including convolutional and attention mechanisms.
explanations.representation learning: The paper generates event-knowledge representations from news data, which involves representation learning.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The model integrates a dilated causal convolutional network to capture temporal dynamics.
explanations.CNN: CNN is used as part of the model architecture to process financial time series data.
explanations.attention mechanism: The paper applies an attention mechanism to infer inter-day relationships among event representations.
explanations.sequence-to-sequence learning: The model processes sequential data (financial time series and news data), which is related to sequence-to-sequence learning.
explanations.seq2seq: The model's architecture involves processing sequences, similar to seq2seq models.
explanations.encoder-decoder: The model's approach to blending news and financial data can be seen as an encoder-decoder framework.
